'''Poisonous potato chips''' are a joke [[food]] item, added in [[24w14potato]], obtained by smelting [[poisonous potato slices]].

== Obtaining ==
{{Smelting
|Poisonous Potato Slices
|Poisonous Potato Chips
}}

== Usage ==
To eat poisonous potato chips, press and hold {{control|use}} while it is selected in the hotbar. Eating one restores {{hunger|8}} [[hunger]] and 12 [[saturation]]. Unlike unprocessed poisonous potato, chips do not cause [[Poison]].
